text: Aaron Abrams is a Canadian actor and writer who has worked in both film and television. He has appeared in several regular and recurring roles on television. He is known for his work in Children Ruin Everything, Masters of Sex, Rookie Blue, Slings & Arrows, Longmire, The Oath, Blindspot, Blue Bloods, and Hannibal. Abrams has also had supporting roles in films such as Amelia, Flash of Genius, and the Code 8 franchise. He has written and produced several films. He is known for his work on The Lovebirds, a comedy, and has also written and produced films like The Go-Getters and Young People Fucking. He worked on the television series The L.A. Complex as well. ==References== Category:Canadian actors
title: Aaron Abrams
